"Incapacitation":
"This will explain Incapacitation.

When an Individual's HP reaches 0, they become incapacitated and unable to move."

"When incapacitated, either choose from the return to campship option or (except for some special cases) wait for help from your allies.

You are able to chat even in this condition, so you may consult with other party members. "

"Existing party members can also revive an individual who has become incapacitated by using a restorative item such as a Moon Atomizer.

Furthermore, if they have a Scape Doll or a Half Doll, they can revive themselves on the spot.

You do not necessarily need to use a restorative item to revive an incapacitated partner character, as they will automatically be revived after a set amount of time has passed."
